main event: Staff Sergeant Ira L. Livingston reported seeing flying discs over Birmingham, Alabama on July 6, 1947.
interesting points: Livingston was alerted by a neighbor to the sighting,Objects were estimated to be 2000 feet above the horizon traveling at a speed of 600 to 800 mph,The discs glowed dimly and were approximately 10 ft in diameter,The objects moved in a level flight and appeared one after another but not always on the same path,At no time did Livingston see more than one object simultaneously, indicating the possibility of multiple discs.
witness description: Staff Sergeant Ira L. Livingston and a neighbor, Mrs. Gallagher.
